amendment.description: An amendment numbered 47 printed in Part B of House Report 118-269 to prohibit funds from being used to regulate or require farmers disclose scope 3 emissions.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fischbach amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fischbach amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Fischbach amendment (A025) Agreed to by voice vote.
